objects.description: [Cardinal RAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0348) is downloaded and installed via an executed [Assess leadership areas of interest](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1224) payload. [Cardinal RAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0348) can also download and execute additional payloads.

external_references.description: Grunzweig, J.. (2017, April 20). Cardinal RAT Active for Over Two Years. Retrieved December 8, 2018.
